title: Like / Love / Hate + -ing
description: Слушайте, что люди любят или не любят делать.

tasks.audioText: Tell me about your hobbies. I love swimming in the sea.
tasks.transcript: I love swimming in the sea.

options.text: The person really enjoys sea swimming.
The person hates swimming.
The person swims in a pool only.
The person is afraid of water.

tasks.explanation: 'Love swimming' means the person really enjoys this activity.

tasks.audioText: My brother is very different from me. He hates getting up early in the morning.
tasks.transcript: He hates getting up early in the morning.

options.text: He enjoys waking up early.
He really dislikes waking up early.
He always gets up early.
He wakes up late every day by choice.

tasks.explanation: 'Hates getting up early' means he strongly dislikes it.

tasks.audioText: We do many things on weekends. We like playing board games together.
tasks.transcript: We like playing board games together.

options.text: They do not enjoy board games.
They play video games, not board games.
They enjoy playing board games as a group.
They play board games alone.

tasks.explanation: 'Like playing' means they enjoy doing this activity.

tasks.audioText: My daughter is very creative. She enjoys painting pictures after school.
tasks.transcript: She enjoys painting pictures after school.

options.text: She likes to paint after school.
She dislikes painting.
She paints before school.
She takes photos after school.

tasks.explanation: 'Enjoys painting' means she gets pleasure from this activity.

tasks.audioText: I feel stressed at work every day. I hate sitting at a desk for eight hours.
tasks.transcript: I hate sitting at a desk for eight hours.

options.text: The person likes sitting at a desk.
The person strongly dislikes sitting all day.
The person sits for only two hours.
The person works standing up.

tasks.explanation: 'Hate sitting' means the person strongly dislikes this activity.

tasks.audioText: My grandmother is a good cook. She loves baking cakes for the family.
tasks.transcript: She loves baking cakes for the family.

options.text: Grandmother really enjoys making cakes.
Grandmother dislikes baking.
Grandmother buys cakes from a shop.
Grandmother bakes bread, not cakes.

tasks.explanation: 'Loves baking' means she gets great pleasure from making cakes.

tasks.audioText: I go to the gym after work. I like running on the treadmill.
tasks.transcript: I like running on the treadmill.

options.text: The person enjoys using the treadmill.
The person hates the treadmill.
The person runs outside, not on a treadmill.
The person lifts weights only.

tasks.explanation: 'Like running' means the person enjoys this exercise.

tasks.audioText: We all have different tastes. My husband hates watching romantic films.
tasks.transcript: My husband hates watching romantic films.

options.text: Her husband loves romantic films.
Her husband really dislikes romantic movies.
Her husband watches romantic films every day.
Her husband likes all types of films.

tasks.explanation: 'Hates watching' means he strongly dislikes this type of film.

tasks.audioText: My cat is very playful. She enjoys chasing butterflies in the garden.
tasks.transcript: She enjoys chasing butterflies in the garden.

options.text: The cat likes running after butterflies.
The cat sleeps in the garden.
The cat is afraid of butterflies.
The cat stays inside the house.

tasks.explanation: 'Enjoys chasing' means the cat likes this activity.

tasks.audioText: I stay home on rainy days. I love reading books with a cup of tea.
tasks.transcript: I love reading books with a cup of tea.

options.text: The person dislikes reading.
The person really enjoys reading and drinking tea.
The person reads books at a cafe.
The person prefers coffee over tea.

tasks.explanation: 'Love reading' means the person gets great enjoyment from books.

tasks.audioText: Traffic is terrible in this city. I hate driving during rush hour.
tasks.transcript: I hate driving during rush hour.

options.text: The person enjoys driving in traffic.
The person strongly dislikes driving in busy traffic.
The person takes the bus during rush hour.
There is no traffic in this city.

tasks.explanation: 'Hate driving during rush hour' means the person strongly dislikes it.

tasks.audioText: My son is always on his phone. He likes playing video games online.
tasks.transcript: He likes playing video games online.

options.text: He enjoys online video games.
He dislikes video games.
He plays board games instead.
He reads books on his phone.

tasks.explanation: 'Likes playing' means the boy enjoys this activity.

tasks.audioText: We have different morning routines. My wife loves listening to music while cooking.
tasks.transcript: My wife loves listening to music while cooking.

options.text: His wife really enjoys music during cooking.
His wife hates music in the kitchen.
His wife listens to music at work.
His wife watches TV while cooking.

tasks.explanation: 'Loves listening to music' means she gets great pleasure from it.

tasks.audioText: The weekend is here at last. I enjoy walking in the park on Sundays.
tasks.transcript: I enjoy walking in the park on Sundays.

options.text: The person likes park walks on Sundays.
The person dislikes the park.
The person walks in the park on Mondays.
The person drives through the park.

tasks.explanation: 'Enjoy walking' means the person likes this weekend activity.

tasks.audioText: My boss is very strict about reports. I don't like writing long reports every week.
tasks.transcript: I don't like writing long reports every week.

options.text: The person loves writing reports.
The person writes reports once a month.
The person does not enjoy weekly report writing.
The boss writes the reports.

tasks.explanation: 'Don't like writing' means the person does not enjoy this task.

short_description: Like / Love / Hate + -ing: что нравится и не нравится делать
